115.content: Who shall it be then?
115.title: Other

1151.content:
Hinata slapped her hand into tree stump she practiced on once again, releasing a small burst of chakra into it as she practiced her Jūken technique. She still had a long way to go, even with her new technique mastered and she had to practice hard if she wanted to achieve anything.
“Hey Hinata.” Kiba’s voice rang out from behind her and she stopped, relieved she could rest her hands for a moment.
Turning she smiled at her teammate who rode on top of his pet and partner, Akamaru. “Yes Kiba?” She asked pleasantly.


Kiba dismounted and walked up to her earnestly, “You think you could watch Akamaru for a few minutes? I need to go get something from home…” He trailed off and Hinata blinked in surprise. Kiba rarely left Akamaru’s side, especially after Akamaru’s sudden growth spurt that had left him larger than anyone in the team, including their teacher Kurenai. Kiba looked away a frown appearing on his face, “Sorry Hinata, I’d ask Shino or Kurenai-sensei, but they’re busy training in the other end of the woods. And it’d take forever to guide him through the large streets in town. It’s just easier to leave him here for now and come back.” He looked down at Akamaru with slight embarrassment, hoping his dog wouldn’t take offense.

Hinata found her voice and shook her head in slight embarrassment, “No, no that’s ok Kiba-kun… I just didn’t expect it.”
Kiba looked back at her with a smile, “Thanks Hinata, I owe you one.” He turned away for a moment, but then turned back fishing a bag from his pocket. Akamaru perked up immediately, watching the bag intently. “Here, I brought these treats for him. If he gets hungry you can give him these. I’ll be back in a little while.”

Hinata nodded and watched him walk away. She really had been shocked that Kiba had left Akamaru with her. Perhaps it was because Akamaru was having trouble fitting in the streets after his massive growth spurt. He had grown so rapidly that nobody, not even Kiba’s family, was sure what they would do if he kept growing. Ironically, Hinata hadn’t grown an inch in almost a year, much to her displeasure.

Turning her attention to Akamaru, Hinata smiled, walking up to him and petting his snout, “Don’t worry Akamaru, Kiba will be right back. I’m sure he’s just going into town for a minute.”

[Written by Jurodan]
1151.title: Hinata

11511.content:
Akamaru wasn’t really paying attention to what she was saying. His stomach was rumbling. Kiba had fed him three dishes this morning, but considering the bowl itself fit inside his mouth Akamaru was still hungry.
Hinata’s hand was gently brushing against his bushy fur coat. To think, less than six months ago, Akamaru fit inside Kiba’s jacket. Now he could barely fit in a street.
Akamaru leaned his head down, sniffing at her pocket. She blinked, then grabbed the small bag, “You’re hungry? Here.” She held out a handful of the snacks.
With barely a move, Akamaru didn’t just swallow the treats, her entire hand was inside his mouth. Hinata’s eyes went wide and she tried to pull away, but by then it was far too late. Akamaru had quickly licked the small snack from her hand, but at that moment, he had tasted something even tastier than Kiba’s snack, Hinata. Hinata tried to jerk her hand out as his tongue slathered over it, but he held onto it gently, tasting it, running his tongue over her soft, delicious skin.
“O-ok Akamaru, let go… that’s not… nice…” Hinata squirmed, she definitely wasn’t used to this sort of attention from Akamaru. Akamaru released her hand and she pulled away, shaking away the excess saliva, and then reluctantly wiping the rest off on her jacket.
No sooner was she done when Akamaru’s tongue rolled right over her chest and all the way over her face. She nearly fell over, stumbling back and wiping the saliva from her eyes in disgust. “Akamaru.”

[Written by Jurodan]
11511.title: Akamaru is Hungry

choices: She fights her way back out
115111.content:
Akamaru didn’t pay attention, she had tasted great, and her chest was fuzzy like a rabbit. His stomach grumbled again and he took a step toward her, bridging the gap instantly.
When she finally cleared her eyes enough to open them, all she could see was Akamaru’s tongue inches from her face. She gasped and quickly shut her eyes, but was unprepared for what happened next. The tongue didn’t hit her first, instead Akamaru knocked her down onto it from behind. She found herself laying flat on the tongue. She opened her eyes again and the horror struck her, she was actually halfway inside Akamaru’s mouth. “AKAMARU!” She shouted, futilely struggling to gain some sort of hold on the slippery tongue. “LET ME OUT!”

Akamaru ignored her and lifted her up into the air. Her legs kicked wildly as she lost track of the ground. Inside his mouth there were more horrified screams. Akamaru still didn’t want to hurt her, she was his friend after all, and a great friend and teammate of Kiba’s, but swallowing her wouldn’t hurt her would it? Akamaru lifted his head straight up and Hinata’s legs disappeared inside of his mouth without another sound.

Hinata struggled to gain some sort of foothold, something she could hold onto, but it was impossible. His mouth was slick with saliva, and his teeth were clamped tightly together. He was going to swallow her whole. The idea struck her dumb, and shock set in. That small bag Kiba had given her wasn’t the dog food, she was. Akamaru’s tongue rolled her back, her head and shoulders falling into his throat. Awareness returning to her, she reached out for his uvula, barely touching the edge before being dragged down further into his throat. Now only her feet remained on his tongue.

The air was growing warm and stagnant in his throat. Whatever Kiba fed him, it certainly didn’t smell good, and she was about to take a dip in it. As well as whatever acids he used to digest that food. Her eyes widened in horror, and she screamed again, trying to struggle and force her way back up his throat, but only forcing her way down further. Her head was suddenly pushed through the cardia and she found herself in the complete blackness that was Akamaru’s stomach. Taking a few rapid breaths, she screamed again.

Akamaru heard the scream, but was too busy swallowing to react. She was nearly inside his stomach. She’d be fine after that, after all, all the other animals he’d eaten that had gone in there had been fine, and had stopped struggling after a few minutes.
Hinata was pushed in past her shoulders, and then her waist, her hair slipping into the stagnant brew of acid and partially digested food. Hinata tried to lean back, but it became impossible as her legs were quickly pushed through and she dropped unceremoniously into the small cavern. Terrified, she whirled, trying to find a way out, trying to force her way back up his esophagus but was unable to force the clamped muscle open.

The air was absolutely rancid, she could barely breath and she was beginning to feel woozy. She wouldn’t be able to survive in here for long. She had to do something now or she’d never make it out.

[Written by Jurodan]
115111.title: He goes on

choices: Kiba or Akamaru does something else
1151111.content:
“Hey! Akamaru!” Kiba waved to Akamaru as he walked back onto the training ground, a rather large sack on his back. Akamaru was still growing, and he’d need much more than the snacks that he’d given Hinata. He could probably wolf down an entire bag of food like this and still be hungry. Taking another step he kicked something, “Huh?” He looked down to he find Hinata’s pack lying on the ground, with all of her supplies on it. He gawked for a moment, and then dropped the bag, rushing towards Akamaru.

Hinata’s breath was growing labored. There was barely any left. She only had one option, and if it didn’t work, she wouldn’t make it. She just had to make sure it worked. She had practiced for weeks, months, but never in anticipation of a situation like this. She had to hit his stomach and send a blast of chakra through into his muscles, it’d spread through his system and he’d be forced to vomit her up… easy… Hinata calmed down for a moment, focusing herself, she couldn’t get this wrong. Opening her eyes she struck.

Akamaru looked up to find Kiba racing towards him. “Akamaru! What happened to Hinata? Do you know where she went?” He reached Akamaru and kneeled down next to him, biting his upper lip, “Are you ok? Why are you lying down?”
Akamaru was about to answer when the strike landed. Akamaru rolled over, nearly crushing Kiba, who scrambled out of his way. The pain surged through Akamaru’s system and he gagged, nearly choking himself in the process. He righted himself and coughed, small bits of food and saliva flying out of his mouth. Kiba tried to approach, but Akamaru turned, coughing and stumbling away from him. He stopped gagging without making a sound,
struggling to throw up. Kiba ran to his dog, running his hand over Akamaru’s back and rubbing his throat in an attempt to sooth him, “That’s good Akamaru, get that out of your system, whatever it is, it can’t be good for you.” He said, frustrated and frightened by what could have happened to him and Hinata.

There was a shout from in front of him and Kiba stiffened, looking to find the source.
As soon as her head exited his throat, Hinata pulled in a ragged breath, even with the sickening stench of dog breath tainting it, the fresh air was the sweetest thing she had ever smelled. ‘I’m almost out!’ Hinata thought triumphantly, grasping Akamaru’s teeth and pull hard, forcing her chest out of his throat. Resting for only a second, she grabbed his canines and pulled one last time, pulling herself free and tumbling out of his mouth.
“Hi—Hi—Hinata?” Kiba stuttered, his jaw going slack in sheer shock of the sight before him.

Hinata lay sprawled out on the ground for a moment, dragging in breath after breath. She was soaked through to the bone with saliva and bile. But she was alive. Forcing herself to her hands and knees and then, unsteadily, to her feet she stood. Kiba could only watch as she took a few stumbling steps away from Akamaru before turning around and pointing at the still coughing dog. “BAD DOG!” She shouted and then collapsed.

[Written by Jurodan]

124.content:
Robin awoke from her slumber in the middle of the night with an extreme hunger pains in her stomach.
She rose from her bed a left her cabin on the ship for the kitchen. Ther lying half asleep next to a bottle
of beer blocking the cupboards, lay Chopper. Her stomach growled vigorously at the sight of him.
"Oh what can I do" she thought knowing that he had been placed their to guard their already low food
supplies. "If I wake him now he will accuse me of sneaking food against orders" she moaned.
Her stomach growled again Robin knew she needed food now but should she risk punishment.
124.title: Robin

12531.content:
You are the clumsy but very pretty mermaid Keimi. Right now you are roaming along the shores of Sabaody Archipelago. It's some day before you first meet the Mugiwara Crew. You're one of the few mermaids that always gets into trouble. Especially with other Sea animals. Before today you've been eaten 19 times already and you only survived by luck all those encounters.
You don't know what has driven you today to the shore. Maybe it were those lights, maybe the thrill or maybe just because you just swam in the wrong direction.
But who cares. Right now you're having fun and minding your own business.
Pappug was not with you this time. He had to finish a special fashion collection he said.
So you swim on your back away from the Sabaody Archipelago when you suddenly bump into something.
You turn around and see...
12531.title: Keimi

125311.content:
You rub over your head and see a big ship behind you. You can't see what type of ship it is. Curious as you are you stay where you are and look up. "Uhm... Excuse me?" You shout up when you hear mumbling from above. "Uhm Hello?" You ask again when suddenly a fishernet surrounded you. "What the..." you yelled in surprise when you were yanked out of the water and thrown on the deck of the ship. The fall was hard and you were a bit drowzy when you looked around you. It was actually a ship full of pirates. You gulp heavily as you saw the lustful and unfriendly faces. "Captain. We made a nice catch today."
One of the pirates says. "Hey I'm no catch." Keimi said pouting. From behind came a voice. "Oh my. She sure is an eye candy. This is indeed one of our best catches since today." The men on the deck laugh in agreement and mumble. "So what shall we do with her? Any ideas?"
Actually there were two people who had an idea.
125311.title: A ship

info.brief_description: A Interactive about Naruto and One Piece
info.description:
It's a Vore Story of either One Piece or Naruto.
Nearly everything is allowed except for messy things (scat or watersport play), hardvore, blood and gore.
You can choose out of a wide cast of characters or be your own creation.
Please watch your language and try to make propper sentences.

Naruto takes place after the 2 years of Narutos training.
